title: Programming Learning Design for Enhancing Debugging Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming syntax and algorithm comprehension
context.additional_context: Program for professional learners to acquire workplace-applicable debugging skills, featuring personalized device usage and flexible scheduling aligned with individual biorhythms

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose the root cause of problems in given error scenarios with 80% accuracy within three attempts.
Learners can analyze eye-tracking data to explain cognitive load patterns occurring during their debugging process.
Learners can achieve a self-assessment score of at least 4.5/5 on average across five real-case debugging activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
